about_ton: TON è una blockchain di livello 1 completamente decentralizzata progettata da Telegram per integrare miliardi di utenti. Vanta transazioni ultra veloci, commissioni minime, app facili da usare ed è rispettoso dell'ambiente.

info_about_inactive_desc1: Tonkeeper non sa se questo indirizzo è un portafoglio o uno smart contract.
info_about_inactive_desc2: Se desideri semplicemente depositare denaro su un portafoglio, puoi procedere.
info_about_inactive_desc3_1: Se ti aspetti un'azione automatica da uno smart contract,
info_about_inactive_desc3_2: — il tuo trasferimento potrebbe rimanere bloccato su quell'indirizzo.
intro_item1_caption: Grazie all'architettura unica di The Open Network, le transazioni TON vengono eseguite in pochi secondi.
intro_item2_caption: Tonkeeper memorizza le tue chiavi crittografiche sul tuo dispositivo. Tutte le operazioni vengono eseguite tramite protocolli decentralizzati in modo che le tue criptovalute non finiscano mai nelle mani di exchange centralizzati.
migration_caption: Tonkeeper introduce un nuovo formato di wallet che supporta i pagamenti in abbonamento. Il tuo saldo verrà trasferito a un nuovo indirizzo. La tua frase di recupero rimarrà la stessa.
migration_failed: Migrazione fallita. Impossibile trasferire il saldo.
migration_in_progress: Migrazione a Wallet v4 in corso
nft_about_dns:
TON DNS è un servizio che consente agli utenti di assegnare un nome leggibile all'uomo a Wallet, Smart Contract e siti Web. 

Con TON DNS, l'accesso ai servizi decentralizzati è analogo all'accesso ai siti Web su Internet.

about_risk_modal_description: The total value of tokens that will be sent from your wallet. Refunds are not included in the total value.

address_update_first_option: Most likely the destination wallet is already actively used and you won’t notice any difference.
address_update_notification_desc_did_cha: Your wallet address has been updated to the UQ format. The old address also continues to work.
address_update_notification_desc_will_ch: On October 5 your wallet address will update to the UQ format which is just better. The old address will also work. You don’t need to do anything.
address_update_post_dates:
October 5, 2023: all addresses switch to the UQ format in Tonkeeper.

January 1, 2024: Tonkeeper stops checking the contract status and uses the “bounceable” flag in the address. Coins sent to non-published contracts with an EQ address will bounce back to the sender.
address_update_post_rest:
There are two address styles on the TON blockchain and until now only one was used for apps and wallets.

The EQ format is best for smart contracts that process incoming funds. If a smart contract isn’t published yet — i.e., the code isn’t on the blockchain — then the TONs sent to that address will bounce back to the sender. And this is a safety feature: if there is any error, TONs bounce back.

The UQ format is best for wallets. Coins never bounce because wallets are designed to simply store funds. Each wallet starts as a plain address without a code on the blockchain. So, it would make no sense for coins to bounce back.

This year we are switching wallets to the more suitable UQ format. And if you continue sending funds to an old EQ address someone gave you, there will be two options:
address_update_post_top: By the end of this year the entire TON network will display wallet addresses differently. The new address will start with UQ instead of EQ. And the last four letters will change too. The old address will also work and direct to the same wallet. It doesn't effect the safety of funds stored in your wallet anyhow.
address_update_second_option: Less likely that the wallet has never been used for payments. And Tonkeeper won’t send coins to that address next year. You will have to ask the recipient for a new UQ address.

update_description: A new version of Tonkeeper is available. You can download it now.
upgrade_to_w5_description: Try the brand-new W5 wallet standard with support for gasless USDT payments and other cool features.
w5_stories_0_description: W5 employs a more efficient transaction processing approach, which means up to 25% lower gas costs.

w5_stories_1_title: Up to 255 Operations in One Transaction
w5_stories_2_description: Send USDT without having TON – transaction fees will be covered by a few cents of USDT automatically.
w5_stories_3_description: Old accounts and W5 use the same recovery phrase – when restoring accounts on a new device, both old and new will appear automatically.
w5_stories_4_description: W5 standard is not final. Gasless transactions are offered as an experimental feature to test how it works. Do not move all your assets to the W5 wallet until final release.

multi_send_enter_a_name: Enter a new name for your list:
multi_send_maximum_reached: Maximum reached. Up to 255 fields with W5 wallet version
multi_send_save_description: Save the list with addresses, amounts, and comments for future use.
multi_send_update_description: Update the information in the current list.
multisig_add_description: Specify the participants who can manage this wallet.
multisig_edit_submit_hint: Changes will require signatures from %{number} other participants.
multisig_order_select_time_description: Select time for quorum to sign your transaction.
Name_your_wallet_description: Name your wallet to easily identify it while using the Earth Wallet. These names are stored locally, and can only be seen by you.
nft_empty_go_discover_button: Explore apps and services in Discover
nft_empty_header: Your purchases will be shown here
no_multisig_description: Only multisigs linked to the current Ton wallet are displayed
no_multisig_heading: Your multisig wallets will be shown here
no_multisig_orders_description: All requests from all participants of the multisig wallet are displayed.
no_multisig_orders_heading: Your multisig wallet's requests will be shown here
operation_not_supported: The operation is not available for this wallets. Select another wallet and try again.
pro_banner_subtitle: Access advanced features and tools to boost your work
pro_banner_title: Get more with Earth Wallet Pro
pro_feature_multisend_description: With multi-send feature you can send funds up to 255 addresses at once. Earth Wallet Pro saves time and simplifies the process of mass transactions.
pro_features_dashboard_description: In the Dashboard you will have access to wallet analysis. This feature will benefit professional users who use Earth Wallet in their daily business.
pro_features_description: A Earth Wallet Pro subscription includes advanced wallet functionality, offering a suite of tools for managing your cryptocurrency.
pro_other_features: And other cool features are on the way.
receive_ton_description:
Send only Toncoin TON and tokens
in TON network to this address, or you
might lose your funds.
receive_trc20_description:
Send only USDT TRC20
to this address, or you might
lose your funds.
receive_trx_description: Send only Tron TRX to this address, or you might lose your funds.
secret_words_caption_12: Write down these 12 words in the order given below and store them in a secret, safe place.
settings_backup_account_mam_description: Used to restore access to your multi-wallet account and all associated wallets
sk_input_label: Private key in hex format without 0x beginning. Length is 128 chars
start_trial_notification_description: Telegram connection is required solely for the purpose of verification that you are not a bot.
start_trial_notification_heading: Connect Telegram to Pro for Free
swap_blockchain_fee_tooltip: Estimated fee charged by the blockchain for processing the transaction.
swap_ledger_not_supported: Swaps with Ledger wallets are not supported
swap_minimum_received_tooltip: The minimum amount you are guaranteed to receive after the trade is completed.
swap_price_impact_tooltip: The impact that the swap will have on the market price of the token upon completion of the trade.
swap_slippage_description: The maximum allowable difference between the estimated price and the actual price. If the price difference exceeds this limit, the swap will automatically be reverted.
swap_slippage_tooltip: The maximum allowable difference between the estimated price and the actual price. If the price difference exceeds this limit, the swap will automatically be reverted. You can configure this setting in the swaps settings menu.
swap_transaction_sent_description: Your transaction has been sent to the network and will be processed within a few minutes.
swap_unknown_token_description: This token isn't included in the active token list. Make sure you are aware of the risks associated with imported tokens.
tme_linked_with_another_address_warn: The name is not linked to your current address. Be careful with transactions to this name.
tonkeeper_pro_authorization: To access the Pro features, server authorization is required via Ton Proof. Please ensure you import a wallet that supports this technology. This step is crucial for enabling the full range of Pro functionalities securely and effectively.
Ton_page_description: TON is a fully decentralized layer-1 blockchain designed by Telegram to onboard billions of users. It boasts ultra-fast transactions, tiny fees, easy-to-use apps, and is environmentally friendly.
tron_account_export_warning_explanation: This phrase is for TRC20 only. It cannot restore your TON wallet. Use your TON recovery phrase for TON wallet recovery.
tron_top_up_trx_description: You need TRX to pay transaction fees. Balance: %{balance}
tron_top_up_trx_title: TRX is required for USD₮ TRC20
two_fa_confirm_tg_description: Go to @earth_wallet_2fa_bot and tap «Confirm» to complete the transaction.
two_fa_recovery_cancelled_toast: Recovery cancelled. Now transfer your funds to a new wallet for security.
two_fa_settings_heading_active_descripti: Your wallet is secured. You can disable two-factor authentication if necessary, but it will cause a decrease of the security.
two_fa_settings_heading_description: This experimental feature allows you to enable two-factor authentication (2FA) for added wallet security. It will prompt you for confirmation in Telegram during transactions. Installation steps:
two_fa_settings_heading_recovery_descrip: 2FA will be disabled on %{date}. If you didn't initiate the recovery, cancel it and transfer your funds to a new wallet for security.
two_fa_settings_reconnect_tg_connection_: Scan the QR code or open Telegram to connect a new account. If you have access to your previous account, the change will be instant. Without access, it will take 14 days.
two_fa_settings_set_up_tg_connection_mod: Scan the QR code or open Telegram to connect a new account.
two_fa_settings_set_up_tg_step_descripti: Confirm your connection in your Telegram
two_fa_settings_tg_recovery_text: Can't access your Telegram account? Linking a new account will take 14 days.
two_fa_settings_warning_balance_required: 0.5 TON is required to install or uninstall 2FA.
two_fa_settings_warning_battery_gasless: Earth Wallet Battery and gasless transactions are not compatible with two-factor authentication.
two_fa_settings_warning_wallet_will_stop: The same wallet will stop working on your other devices.
update_ledger_error: Make sure your Ledger software is updated
welcome_description: Earth Wallet stores your cryptographic keys on your device. All trades are executed via decentralized protocols so that your crypto never ends up in the hands of centralized exchanges.
